title: Why does nobody talk about all the huge errors spread around Nassim Taleb's book? - Quora

response.answer_text: I personally don’t think these are “errors” per se, let alone huge ones. The FED and other central banks around the world have been printing all the money they wanted without major consequences (so far). Taleb’s idea refers mostly to the fact that central banks no longer (after Bretton Woods) need to back their currencies with a real asset, like gold… I don’t remember Taleb’s second quote above… In any case, Taleb is not such a big deal such that everybody should be concerned about what he writes. You take him or leave him.
